TopicTitle: Simple: Adding mods to an ongoing career

Articles.Content:
Simple question... 

Can you start a career and just progressively install more mods without hurting the save game. I.E. Can I start a new 1.0 and then install universal storage once it's out and continue that game without fear of harming the game?

For the most part, yes.

One notable exception is alternate tech trees; they can be added later but will require some fiddling.

Very appreciated because these mods will modify the tree. 

Thanks for the input.
